content: **pattern usage** for personal use gifting and donation only if you are involved in an animal charity please contact me with details of the charity and event for permission to sell for fund-raising **please do not sell or duplicate this pattern or ever use items made from this pattern for personal gain ** **note from designer ** 5-minute mouse is just a name to indicate simple it s not a judgment on your crochet skill please don t anyone else tell me how long it actually took it s a free pattern for goodness sake skill level beginner size about 2 5 inches long gauge not important materials small amount of worsted weight yarn f hook small amount of polyfil catnip optional stitch marker tapestry needle
